fr.sii.ogham.testing.assertion.util

Class AssertionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.testing.assertion.util.AssertionHelper

  • public final class AssertionHelper
extends Object
    Utility class for Ogham assertions.
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> void assertThat(String reason, T actual, org.hamcrest.Matcher<? super T> matcher)
      Copy of MatcherAssert.assertThat(String, Object, Matcher) with the following additions: If the matcher can provide expected value, a ComparisonFailure exception is thrown instead of AssertionError in order to display differences between expected string and actual string in the IDE. If the matcher is a CustomReason matcher and no reason is provided, the reason of the matcher is used to provide more information about the context (which message has failed for example)
      static <T> void assertThat(T actual, org.hamcrest.Matcher<? super T> matcher)
      Copy of MatcherAssert.assertThat(Object, Matcher) with the following additions: If the matcher can provide expected value, a ComparisonFailure exception is thrown instead of AssertionError in order to display differences between expected string and actual string in the IDE. If the matcher is a CustomReason matcher and no reason is provided, the reason of the matcher is used to provide more information about the context (which message has failed for example)
      static <T> org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> overrideDescription(String description, org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> delegate)
      Ogham helper for overriding default description.
      static <T> org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> usingContext(String reasonTemplate, Context context, org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> delegate)
      Ogham helper for keeping context information when using fluent assertions.

    • Method Detail

      • assertThat

        public static <T> void assertThat(T actual,
                                  org.hamcrest.Matcher<? super T> matcher)
        Copy of MatcherAssert.assertThat(Object, Matcher) with the following additions:
        • If the matcher can provide expected value, a ComparisonFailure exception is thrown instead of AssertionError in order to display differences between expected string and actual string in the IDE.
        • If the matcher is a CustomReason matcher and no reason is provided, the reason of the matcher is used to provide more information about the context (which message has failed for example)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type used for the matcher
        Parameters:
        actual - the actual value
        matcher - the matcher to apply

      • assertThat

        public static <T> void assertThat(String reason,
                                  T actual,
                                  org.hamcrest.Matcher<? super T> matcher)
        Copy of MatcherAssert.assertThat(String, Object, Matcher) with the following additions:
        • If the matcher can provide expected value, a ComparisonFailure exception is thrown instead of AssertionError in order to display differences between expected string and actual string in the IDE.
        • If the matcher is a CustomReason matcher and no reason is provided, the reason of the matcher is used to provide more information about the context (which message has failed for example)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type used for the matcher
        Parameters:
        reason - the reason
        actual - the actual value
        matcher - the matcher to apply

      • usingContext

        public static <T> org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> usingContext(String reasonTemplate,
                                                       Context context,
                                                       org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> delegate)
        Ogham helper for keeping context information when using fluent assertions.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type used for the matcher
        Parameters:
        reasonTemplate - the template for the reason
        context - the evaluation context
        delegate - the matcher to decorate
        Returns:
        the matcher

      • overrideDescription

        public static <T> org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> overrideDescription(String description,
                                                              org.hamcrest.Matcher<T> delegate)
        Ogham helper for overriding default description.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type used for the matcher
        Parameters:
        description - the description to display
        delegate - the matcher to decorate
        Returns:
        the matcher
